A

AbstractLDAPServer - Class in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap
Abstract base class for LDAPServer implementations.
AbstractLDAPServer() - Constructor for class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap.AbstractLDAPServer
 
AUTH_DN - Static variable in interface com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap.LDAPServer
The name of the parameter that specifies the identity used to authenticate connections.

C

com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap - package com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap
 
configure(String, Object, Logger) - Method in class com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap.AbstractLDAPServer
Used to configure the root DN of the LDAP directory, the working directory used by the directory service to store the directory data, the LDIF file used to seed the directory or the TCP port number on which the server will listening for LDAP traffic.

L

LDAP_PORT - Static variable in interface com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap.LDAPServer
The name of the parameter that specifies the port on which the LDAP service will listen for traffic.
LDAPServer - Interface in com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap
The interface that must be implemented by LDAP servers.
LDIF_FILE - Static variable in interface com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap.LDAPServer
The name of the parameter that specifies an LDIF file containing seed data.

O

OBJECT_CLASSES - Static variable in interface com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap.LDAPServer

P

R

W

WORK_DIR - Static variable in interface com.btmatthews.maven.plugins.ldap.LDAPServer
The name of the parameter that specifies a working/scratch directory that can be used by the plugin.
